action.description: From committee: Amend, and do pass as amended.Placed on Second Reading File.Read second time. Amended. (Amend. No. 21.)Declared an emergency measure under the Constitution.Reprinting dispensed with.Placed on General File.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved. (Yeas: 19, Nays: 2.) To printer.From printer. To engrossment. Engrossed. First reprint. To Assembly.
